Name: collagenous colitis
Definition: A colitis characterized by a distinctive thickening of the subepithelial collagen table.
Synonym: X-linked mental retardation with spastic diplegia

Name: lymphocytic colitis
Definition: A colitis characterized by an accumulation of lymphocytes in the colonic epithelium and connective tissue (lamina propria).
Synonym: X-linked mental retardation with spastic diplegia
